A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good visual\, sound and of course John Williams always make a great score. But the writing destroyed a lot a story tread that was set up in the previous film. Il also seem to want to destroyed the lore established by the 7 previous film. Some plot line seems totally pointless in the overall story of the film.  The caracther has almost no real devellopement except for a contrive romantic story line that is cringe worthy. Star Wars has always had a politcal message in it's undertone but never a star wars movies has ever been so overtly politacal and make the watching experience very ackward at time. Overall it is not a good star wars and it feel more like a end than a middle of a trilogy.
